# Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(asciiSetupReader)
library(here)
here::i_am("analysis.qmd")
```


# Loading in Data

```{r}
df <- read_ascii_setup(
  here("XXH2023_YRBS_Data.dat"), # data file is a .dat file (ASCII) file
  here("2023XXH-SPSS.sps"), # setup file is a .SPS (SPSS) file
  use_value_labels = TRUE,
  use_clean_names = TRUE,
  select_columns = NULL,
  coerce_numeric = TRUE)
```
